    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_114585</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Structure of silica glass and a silica crystal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Struktur des Silikonglases und des 
Silikonkristalles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Structure de verre de silice et d'un cristal de 
silice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estrutura do vidro do silicone e de um cristal do 
silicone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Struttura del vetro del silicone e di un cristallo
del silicone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δομή του γυαλιού πυριτίου και ενός κρυστάλλου 
πυριτίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructura del cristal de la silicona y de un 
cristal de la silicona</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the arrangement of silicon and oxygen atoms in silica glass (left) and a silica crystal (right).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">amorphous solids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">crystal structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">glass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Silica</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Anordnung für Silikon 
und Sauerstoffatome im Silikonglas (nach links) und in einem 
Silikonkristall (recht).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'agencement des atomes
de silicium et d'oxygène dans le verre de silice (à gauche) et un 
cristal de silice (droit).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o arranjo de átomos do 
silicone e de oxigênio no vidro do silicone (à esquerda) e em um 
cristal do silicone (direito).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la disposizione degli 
atomi di ossigeno e del silicone nel vetro del silicone (a sinistra) 
ed in un cristallo del silicone (di destra).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη ρύθμιση των ατόμων 
πυριτίου και οξυγόνου στο γυαλί πυριτίου (αριστερά) και ένα 
κρύσταλλο πυριτίου (δεξιά).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el arreglo de los 
átomos del silicio y de oxígeno en cristal de la silicona (a la 
izquierda) y un cristal de la silicona (derecho).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">formlose Körper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kristallstruktur</string>
          </keyword>
